attributes.action: Government and parliament to cease and desist from abusing the People's powers.
attributes.additional_details: Because of this, all action in parliament is to cease until such time as The People are truly represented in their houses. Government and others in parliament are to do everything within their power to prevent any further actions from either house.
attributes.background: Government and parliament have shown by their actions they have neither the will nor desire to represent the People. As this represents a betrayal of their job description and the people they nominally represent, they must acknowledge they have lost all authority to act on our behalf.
